  method={"post"}

Logger manuellement le début et la fin des règles

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"Date de début des règles","example":"2024-01-15","format":"date"},"endDate":{"type":"string","description":"Date de fin des règles","example":"2024-01-20","format":"date"},"flowIntensity":{"type":"number","description":"Intensité du flux (1=léger, 5=très fort)","example":3,"minimum":1,"maximum":5},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Notes additionnelles","example":"Flux normal, quelques crampes le premier jour"}},"required":["startDate"],"title":"LogPeriodDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Règles enregistrées avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"period":{"description":"Cycle créé ou mis à jour","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiant du cycle","example":"cycle_123456789"},"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"Date de début des règles","example":"2024-01-15T00:00:00.000Z"},"periodLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée des règles en jours","example":5},"cycleLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée totale du cycle en jours","example":28},"isRegular":{"type":"boolean","description":"Cycle régulier","example":true},"flowIntensity":{"type":"number","description":"Intensité du flux moyenne","example":3},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Notes sur ce cycle","example":"Cycle normal, pas de complications"}},"required":["id","startDate","isRegular"],"title":"PeriodDto"}]},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Message de confirmation","example":"Règles enregistrées avec succès"},"isNewCycle":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indique si un nouveau cycle a été créé","example":true}},"required":["period","message","isNewCycle"],"title":"LogPeriodResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Données invalides"}}}
 id="cycle-controller-log-period-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
